verses.name: Matthew 13:50
verses.text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire: there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth.

verses.name: Matthew 13:51
verses.text: Jesus saith unto them, Have ye understood all these things? They say unto him, Yea, Lord.

verses.name: Matthew 13:52
verses.text: Then said he unto them, Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder, which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old.

verses.name: Matthew 13:53
verses.text: And it came to pass, that when Jesus had finished these parables, he departed thence.
